https://tmrev.io/movie/741010-Assistant Director: Luigi Cozzi 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Assistant director Luigi Cozzi recalls his first encounter with Dario Argento and discusses his contribution to The Stendhal Syndrome. There are additional very interesting observations about the director's stylistic preferences and how they impacted the evolution of his work. Assistant Director: Luigi Cozzi
